attributes.action: Take away life peerages from criminals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A lord who has a life peerage is a criminal who has served time in prison. The goverment should do all it canb to make sure these criminals are not able to continue to use this title after they have commited a criminal offence. Why should people be allowed to use the title lord when the have been in prison.
